title._content: [Two unidentified soldiers in Union uniforms, one wearing musician's uniform and holding Model 1840 musician's sword, the other holding Colt Model 1851 Navy revolver] (LOC)

description._content: [Two unidentified soldiers in Union uniforms, one wearing musician's uniform and holding Model 1840 musician's sword, the other holding Colt Model 1851 Navy revolver] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 11.1 x 12.5 cm (frame) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
